content: 5 circ 1 work row 7 from faux-cable stitch pattern circ 2 p1 k6 * p2 k2 m1r k2 ssk repeat from * 1 time p2 k6 p1 round 6 work next row of faux-cable stitch pattern across both needles repeat round 6 until all row of faux-cable stitch pattern have been worked a total of three more times ending with row 16 cuff round 1 2 p1 * k2 p2 repeat from * end p1 round 3 5 * p1 k3 repeat from * around round 6 8 * k2 p1 k1 p1 k2 p1 repeat from * around round 9 * k1 p1 repeat from * around continue in k1 p1 ribbing for approximately 1 finishing bind off loosely using stretchy bind-off technique the pictured socks were bound off using a kitchener bind-off break yarn weave in ends enjoy your socks © 2007 judy becker / last update 12/20/2021 http //www persistentillusion com
